settings.banner_title: Your Gift Registry is set up and now it's time to share it with your friends and family
settings.banner_content:
Simply enter your friends' email address below and they will receive an email with all the info on how to shop from it! It's easy, promise.

You can also copy your unique Gift Registry URL below and send it to friends via SMS or include it on your Baby Shower invite on Facebook or Paperless Post. Don't forget to include your password!
